system.description:
Fiendish contacts have instructed you on the dark power of consuming your own life force to empower your magic.  You gain the following abilities:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your spellcasting ability score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You may sacrifice vigor and vitality, your very blood and life force, to empower your magic.  As a bonus action you may regain up to 7 spell points, taking 2 points of damage per spell points regained when you do so.  As a bonus action you may also regain a spell slot of 5th level or lower, taking damage equal to 3 times the level of spell slot regained.  You may use each of these abilities once per long rest.
  • When you cast a spell of 1st-level or higher that deals damage, you may re-roll any number of those dice one time taking the new result and taking 1d4 necrotic per damage die re-rolled.
  • When you cast a spell of 1st-level or higher from the Evil secondary school you may take one point of necrotic damage per spell level to treat it as one spell level higher to a maximum of 9th level.
  • When you cast a spell that requires a saving throw you may take 1d6 necrotic damage per spell level to impose disadvantage on the save.
  • Any damage taken from Blood Magic cannot be reduced or prevented in anyways, and anytime you take damage from this feat you must make a DC 15 con save or have your hit point maximum reduced by the amount of damage taken until you finish a long rest.
